languages.text: {n}Визоры техножреца нервно пощелкивают, меняя и фокусируя спектральные линзы.{/n} "Богохульное инфосмешение... Ересь... Техногубство..."

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Поглощенные увиденным, визоры техножреца нервно пощелкивают, меняя и фокусируя спектральные линзы. Концентрированный поток технолингвы прерывается взволнованным{/n} "Богохульное инфосмешение... Ересь... Техногубство..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it switches repeatedly between different optical lenses and focal points.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."
languages.original_text: {n}Визоры техножреца нервно пощелкивают, меняя и фокусируя спектральные линзы.{/n} "Богохульное инфосмешение... Ересь... Техногубство..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it keeps switching between different optical lenses and changing focus.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Visor klickt nervös, während er rasch zwischen verschiedenen optischen Linsen und Fokuspunkten wechselt.{/n} "Frevlerische Datenvermischung ... Ketzerei ... Tech-Grausamkeit ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it switches repeatedly between different optical lenses and focal points.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Visor klickt nervös, während er rasch zwischen verschiedenen optischen Linsen und Fokuspunkten wechselt.{/n} "Frevlerische Datenvermischung ... Ketzerei ... Tech-Grausamkeit ..."

languages.text: {n}Le viseur optique de Pasqal cliquette nerveusement tandis qu'il essaie successivement ses différentes lentilles et tente de faire la mise au point.{/n} « Compilation de données sacrilège... Hérésie... Techno-atrocité... »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it switches repeatedly between different optical lenses and focal points.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le viseur optique de Pasqal cliquette nerveusement tandis qu'il essaie successivement ses différentes lentilles et tente de faire la mise au point.{/n} « Compilation de données sacrilège... Hérésie... Techno-atrocité... »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的面甲不断切换着光学镜片，发出了令人焦虑的咔哒声。{/n}“充满亵渎的数据融合……技术异端……令人发指……”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it switches repeatedly between different optical lenses and focal points.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的面甲不断切换着光学镜片，发出了令人焦虑的咔哒声。{/n}“充满亵渎的数据融合……技术异端……令人发指……”

languages.text: {n}El visor de Pasqal chasquea rápidamente mientras cambia de lentes ópticas y focos de atención.{/n} «Mezclas de datos sacrílegas... Herejía... Tecnoatrocidad...».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it switches repeatedly between different optical lenses and focal points.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El visor de Pasqal chasquea rápidamente mientras cambia de lentes ópticas y focos de atención.{/n} «Mezclas de datos sacrílegas... Herejía... Tecnoatrocidad...».

languages.text: {n}パスカルのバイザーがカチカチと不安げな音を立てながら、さまざまな光学レンズや焦点を次々に切り替えた。{/n}「冒涜的なデータ混合…異端…技術への暴虐行為…」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's visor clicks anxiously as it switches repeatedly between different optical lenses and focal points.{/n} "Sacrilegious data-mixing... Heresy... Tech-atrocity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのバイザーがカチカチと不安げな音を立てながら、さまざまな光学レンズや焦点を次々に切り替えた。{/n}「冒涜的なデータ混合…異端…技術への暴虐行為…」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın vizörü, farklı optik lensler ve odak noktaları arasında sürekli geçiş yaparken endişeyle tıkırdıyor.{/n} "Kutsal verilerin karıştırılması... Kâfirlik... Tekno zulüm..."
